item.title: Fixing Kali VM after dist-upgrade
item.description: I just did a apt-get dist-upgrade to bump up to Kali 1.0.7. I’ve got it running on VirtualBox, and after it booted back up all the VBoxAddition features were gone and the keyboard and mouse in X no longer worked. GRUB was fine however. Poking around the logs a little I discovered some issues with the mouse driver. Perhaps that was it, but why? Long story short it took quite a bit of digging, but I eventually managed to fix it.
